p: During three days of Zoom conversations, we asked these participants how they and their organizations are documenting the twin pandemics of COVID-19 and racial inequality, and what we can learn from the past. What follows are edited transcripts from our conversations, in three sections: “Precedents to Documenting COVID-19,” “Viral Lessons,” related to how current collection efforts might serve public health and medical science, and “Viral Inequalities and an Ethics of Care.”
